TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Oh, I would [@armagheddonsgw](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/8761-armagheddonsgw/) but [it looks like someone beat you to this name](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/53298-anquietas/), unless it's an old account of yours that you forgot?

> 
> 
> Just now, sal\_vager said:
> 
> 
> Oh, I would [@armagheddonsgw](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/8761-armagheddonsgw/) but [it looks like someone beat you to this name](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/53298-anquietas/), unless it's an old account of yours that you forgot?
> 

Damn it. Nah, that pre-dates my usage of it. How about "Anquietas314" then? I generally use that as a fallback on the handful of things where Anquietas is taken.

>

> 
> 
> Damn it. Nah, that pre-dates my usage of it. How about "Anquietas314" then? I generally use that as a fallback on the handful of things where Anquietas is taken.
